item.description:
The Beanstalks have been invited to join Boston Mensa for a trip to the world famous Nordic Lodge for all-you-can-eat LOBSTERS! Don't worry if you don't like lobster.  There are lots of other choices. 

Their gourmet buffet also features Filet Mignon, Jumbo Shrimp, Scallops Wrapped in Bacon, Prime Rib, Spare Ribs, Crab, a Haagen Dazs Ice Cream Bar, and tons more.

Check the full menu at http://www.nordiclodge.com/menu.html

Note: RSVPing on Meetup is not enough.

You MUST sign up and pay at the LobsterFest page before May 23 to reserve a spot:

www.bostonmensa.org/LobsterFest/
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be departing via a bus from one of the Natick shopping centers around noon. Exact time and location will be emailed to registrants.
item.name: LobsterFest (Joint Event - Beanstalks & Boston Mensa)
